title: Bug 102623 - Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image is still displayed.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the original image remains displayed instead of the new image.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout, the new image should be displayed.
SR:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image. 
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 
4. Verify that the new image is displayed instead of the original image.
